definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[[יַרְכָה]], or [[יְרֵכָה]] Ol:§ 167. g] flank, side, du. extreme parts, recesses;—sf. [[יַרְכַָתוֹ]] Ge 49:13; du. [[יַרְכָתַיִם]] Ex 26:27, Ex 36:32 + Ez Eze 46:19 Qr (Kt [[ירכתם]]); [[יַרְכָתָָיִם]] Ex 26:23, Ex 36:28; cstr. [[יַרְכְּתֵי]] Ju Jdg 19:1 + 20 t. + 1Ki 6:16 Qr (Kt [[ירכותי]]);—
side, i.e. further side of Zebulun, poet. for more distant border of his territory Ge 49:13.

elsewhere always du. the two things, i.e. fig. angle, recess, extreme parts: as recesses of Mt. Ephr. Ju Jdg 19:1, Jdg 19:18; of Lebanon 2Ki 19:23 = Is 37:24; of recesses or innermost part of a cave 1Sa 24:4; a house Am 6:10, Ps 128:3; the pit ([[בּוֹר]]) Is 14:15 (‖[[שְׁאוֹל  ָ]]), Ez Eze 32:23; a ship Jon 1:5; [[יַרְכְּתֵי חָפוֹן]] remote parts of the north Is 14:13, Ez Eze 38:6, Eze 38:15, Eze 39:2, Ps 48:3 (but here Lag. prop. [[רחון]] ´[[יר]]); [[יַרְכְּתֵי אָָרֶץ]] remote parts of earth Je 6:22, Je 25:32, Je 31:8, Je 50:41; of a long building, extreme or hinder part, so of tabernacle Ex 26:22, Ex 26:23, Ex 26:27, Ex 36:27, Ex 36:28, Ex 36:32 (all P); of temple 1Ki 6:16; of Ezek.'s temple Ez Eze 46:19.
